casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth Russell ANTHONY 352P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2019 David W. Andrews, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Anthony, Kenneth Russell Sonya M. Calloway-Durham, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender Brandy Cook, District Attorney, For the State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of September 2019 by Plaintiff-Appellant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of September 2019."
